Kim Yong Nam Meets Finnish Ambassador to DPRK 
   Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Yrjo Kim David Luotonen, outgoing Finnish ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
